items.name: Waki Woods – A Camping Hub
items.section_title: Waki Woods – A Camping Hub
items.section_excerpt: Waki Woods finds its way into the list of the best places to see in Nagpur due to being an amazing spot for adventure enthusiasts visiting Vidarbha region. The immense natural green hills give way to some amazing picnic spots with the provision to camp. Some of the best resorts in Nagpur are situated here to enhance your camping or adventure experience.

items.name: Shri Swaminarayan Mandir – Offer Your Prayers
items.section_title: Shri Swaminarayan Mandir – Offer Your Prayers
items.section_excerpt: One of the finest tourist places in Nagpur, the temple is an important landmark in the Vidarbha region. Offer your prayers and indulge yourself in spiritual activities that calm your soul. You can find the idols of many prominent gods including Shri Hanumanji, Shri Shrinathji, and Shri Lakshmi-Narayan Dev. VIsit for some different experiences in the city of Nagpur.

items.name: Futala Lake – A Man-Made Site
items.section_title: Futala Lake – A Man-Made Site
items.section_excerpt: Covering an area of 60 acres, Futala Lake is one of the top tourist places in Nagpur. This is a man-made lake built by the Bhosle kings of Nagpur and famous for its coloured fountains. The illuminated halogen lighting in the evening is an explosive sight to behold. The lake is surrounded by forest on three sides, therefore, it becomes an amazing place to get away from the city hustle and bustle. S…
items.description: Covering an area of 60 acres, Futala Lake is one of the top tourist places in Nagpur. This is a man-made lake built by the Bhosle kings of Nagpur and famous for its coloured fountains. The illuminated halogen lighting in the evening is an explosive sight to behold. The lake is surrounded by forest on three sides, therefore, it becomes an amazing place to get away from the city hustle and bustle. Some of the amazing hotels in Nagpur are located near the lake.
query_hints: Futala Lake – A Man-Made Site
Futala Lake – A Man-Made Site Nagpur

items.name: Balaji Mandir – South Indian Style Of Architecture
items.section_title: Balaji Mandir – South Indian Style Of Architecture
items.section_excerpt: Balaji Mandir is another popular religious place to visit in Nagpur. It is located at Seminary Hills and this two-storeyed temple features a beautiful idol of Lord Balaji, Venkateshwara. The temple exhibits the South Indian style of architecture and offers picturesque views of the surrounding valleys.
items.description: Balaji Mandir is another popular religious place to visit in Nagpur. items.name: Fun N Food Village – For A Fun Retreat
items.section_title: Fun N Food Village – For A Fun Retreat
items.section_excerpt: One of the most famous places to visit in Nagpur is the Fun N Food Village and if you are traveling with kids, then bingo! This is a fun-filled park full of themed rides, entertainment zones and water slides. The amusement park is clean, green, and modern. The park also has a food court for all the hungry souls looking to taste some amazing bites!
